comments.body: I think at least `fromFuture` deserves a test

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +24,28 @@  final def sleep(duration: Duration): Task[Unit] = IO.sleep(duration)

  final def fromFuture[E, A](io: Task[Future[A]])(ec: ExecutionContext): Task[A] =
    io.attempt.flatMap { f =>
      IO.async { (cb: ExitResult[Throwable, A] => Unit) =>
